verse.gurmukhi: Awip n vM\Y swhury isK lok suxwvY[
verse.unicode: ਆਪਿ ਨ ਵੰਞੈ ਸਾਹੁਰੇ ਸਿਖ ਲੋਕ ਸੁਣਾਵੈ।

en.bdb: The Guru prevaricator is similar to a girl who herself goes not to the father-in law's house and gives precepts to others.

transliteration.english: aap na va(n)n(j)ai saahure sikh lok sunaavai|
transliteration.hindi: आपि न वंञै साहुरे सिख लोक सुणावै।
transliteration.en: aap na va(n)n(j)ai saahure sikh lok sunaavai|
transliteration.hi: आपि न वंञै साहुरे सिख लोक सुणावै।
transliteration.ipa: əɑp nə ʋəŋŋæ sɑhʊre sɪkʰ lɔk sʊɳɑʋæ.
transliteration.ur: آپ ن وںنجَے ساهُرے سکھ لوک سُݨاوَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: kMqu n puCY vwqVI suhwgu gxwvY[
verse.unicode: ਕੰਤੁ ਨ ਪੁਛੈ ਵਾਤੜੀ ਸੁਹਾਗੁ ਗਣਾਵੈ।

en.bdb: Her husband never cares for her and she sings paeans of her happy married life.

transliteration.english: ka(n)t na puchhai vaataRee suhaag ganaavai|
transliteration.hindi: कंतु न पुछै वातड़ी सुहागु गणावै।
transliteration.en: ka(n)t na puchhai vaataRee suhaag ganaavai|
transliteration.hi: कंतु न पुछै वातड़ी सुहागु गणावै।
transliteration.ipa: kəŋt̪ nə pʊɕæ ʋɑt̪əɽi sʊhɑG Gəɳɑʋæ.
transliteration.ur: کںت ن پُچھَے واتڑیِ سُهاگ گݨاوَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: cUhw Kf n mwveI lik Cju vlwvY[
verse.unicode: ਚੂਹਾ ਖਡ ਨ ਮਾਵਈ ਲਕਿ ਛਜੁ ਵਲਾਵੈ।

en.bdb: It is such as the rat itself cannot enter the hole but roams tied winnowing tray to its waist.

transliteration.english: choohaa khadd na maaviee lak chhaj valaavai|
transliteration.hindi: चूहा खड न मावई लकि छजु वलावै।
transliteration.en: choohaa khadd na maaviee lak chhaj valaavai|
transliteration.hi: चूहा खड न मावई लकि छजु वलावै।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃuhɑ kʰəɖ nə mɑʋei lək ɕəd͡ʒ ʋəlɑʋæ.
transliteration.ur: چُوها کھڈ ن ماوای لک چھج ولاوَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: mMqu n hoie ATUihAw hQu spIN pwvY[
verse.unicode: ਮੰਤੁ ਨ ਹੋਇ ਅਠੂਹਿਆ ਹਥੁ ਸਪੀਂ ਪਾਵੈ।

en.bdb: It is such a person as not knowing even the mantra of a centipede lays his hand on a snake.

transliteration.english: ma(n)t na hoi aThoohiaa hath sapee(n) paavai|
transliteration.hindi: मंतु न होइ अठूहिआ हथु सपीं पावै।
transliteration.en: ma(n)t na hoi aThoohiaa hath sapee(n) paavai|
transliteration.hi: मंतु न होइ अठूहिआ हथु सपीं पावै।
transliteration.ipa: məŋt̪ nə hɔeɪ əʈʰuhɪəɑ hət̪ʰ səpiⁿ pɑʋæ.
transliteration.ur: مںت ن هوا اٹھُوهآ هتھ سپیِں پاوَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: sru sMnHY Awgws no iPir mQY AwvY[
verse.unicode: ਸਰੁ ਸੰਨ੍ਹੈ ਆਗਾਸ ਨੋ ਫਿਰਿ ਮਥੈ ਆਵੈ।

en.bdb: The person who facing towards sky shoots the arrow receives the arrow on his own face.

transliteration.english: sar sa(n)nhai aagaas no fir mathai aavai|
transliteration.hindi: सरु संन्है आगास नो फिरि मथै आवै।
transliteration.en: sar sa(n)nhai aagaas no fir mathai aavai|
transliteration.hi: सरु संन्है आगास नो फिरि मथै आवै।
transliteration.ipa: sər səŋnʰæ əɑGɑs nɔ fɪr mət̪ʰæ əɑʋæ.
transliteration.ur: سر سنّھَے آگاس نو پھر متھَے آوَے۔

en.bdb: The apostate is yellow faced, frightened in both the worlds and repents.
